msg: HDFS-1646. Federation: MiniDFSClsuter#waitActive() waits for ever with the introduction of BPOfferService in datanode. Contributed by Suresh Srinivas.

author: markt
msg: Start of an SSL re-negotiation test. Need to expand it to handle request bodies and the other issues highlighted by Filip.
Switch to using a CA since it makes the code cleaner and it is easier to get CLIENT-CERT working than will all self-signed certs.
